mapper.select: select M.mem_name, M.mem_num, M.mem_id , M.mem_gen , M.mem_phone , M.mem_email, M.mem_zipcode , M.mem_address1 , M.mem_address2 from MEMBER m WHERE M.MEM_NUM=#{MEM_NUM}

select DISTINCT sum(CASE WHEN A.AORDER_STATE = '배송중' THEN 1 ELSE 0 end) DELIVERING, sum(CASE WHEN A.AORDER_STATE = '배송완료' THEN 1 ELSE 0 end) DELIVERED from MEMBER M , admin_order A WHERE A.mem_num = M.MEM_NUM AND M.MEM_NUM=#{MEM_NUM} group by (M.mem_name, M.mem_id, M.mem_gen, M.mem_phone, M.mem_email, M.mem_zipcode, M.mem_address1, M.mem_address2)
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PW = #{MEM_PW}, MEM_EMAIL = #{MEM_EMAIL}, MEM_ZIPCODE = #{MEM_ZIPCODE}, MEM_ADDRESS1 = #{MEM_ADDRESS1}, MEM_ADDRESS2 = #{MEM_ADDRESS2}, MEM_PHONE = #{MEM_PHONE} WHERE MEM_NUM = #{MEM_NUM}
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE MEM_NUM = #{MEM_NUM}
